static_fields.headline: How to correctly measure your wrist size? | Minase watches | Handmade in Japan
static_fields.description: Minase offers to size your metal bracelet to your wrist’s size at no cost. Hence we thought it might be useful to write a small guide about how to properly measure your wrist’s size.
static_fields.author.name: kellyhenriksen
static_fields.name: How to correctly measure your wrist size? | Minase watches | Handmade in Japan
